name: MetaFabric
description: MetaFabric is the backbone of metaverse communication. Ever wanted to message all CryptoPunk holders? Or the last buyer of a token you hold? Or limit people who can DM you based on their walletâ€™s net worth? MetaFabric is a messenger allowing you to message any wallet address. You can also message all holders of any token or NFT you hold. And you can freely decide who can message by their holdings or net worth, or set a fee to be messaged to avoid spam. Our product is releasing beginning of 2022 and will allow for secure, spam free communication using crypto wallets within the Metaverse. It will be available on Ethereum, BSC, Matic, Arbitrum and soon after Solana and others.
